ch0113_40_mikan/0101_0701_01_10:
Um... [Name:PlayerNickname ]? It’s a beautiful
day for an adventure, isn’t it?
ch0113_40_mikan/0101_0701_02_10: I don’t know how to say this, but good luck...
ch0113_40_mikan/7101_0701_01_10: Isn’t this new outfit just wonderful?
ch0113_40_mikan/7101_0701_02_10:
A lot of people say it looks heavy, but it really
isn’t that bad.
ch0113_40_mikan/7102_0701_01_10:
I think that the hair accessory I have on is really
cute. Every time I move, it swishes.
ch0113_40_mikan/7102_0701_02_10: Maybe I should give a matching one to Celesteela!
ch0113_40_mikan/7103_0701_01_10:
A while ago, Whitney said that my sense of
style was too plain.
ch0113_40_mikan/7103_0701_02_10:
I went to see her wearing these new
clothes to see what she thought.
ch0113_40_mikan/7103_0701_03_10:
She said that these were much better but that
they’re still not flashy enough...
ch0113_40_mikan/7103_0701_04_10:
If these aren’t colorful enough, then what in the
world is?
ch0113_40_mikan/7104_0701_02_10:
Just like a Steel-type Pokémon, I’m... You know...
Clang!
ch0113_40_mikan/7104_0701_03_10: D-don’t I look very hard, cold, and sharp?
ch0113_40_mikan/7105_0701_01_10:
Um... What do you think about Celesteela,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0113_40_mikan/7105_0701_02_10:
Sometimes people get frightened of Celesteela
because it’s an Ultra Beast.
ch0113_40_mikan/7105_0701_03_10:
I really want people to know that they have
nothing to be afraid of. Celesteela isn’t scary.
ch0113_40_mikan/7105_0701_04_10:
So I’ll go anywhere and do anything I can to show
how great Celesteela is!
ch0113_40_mikan/1701_0701_01_10: Um... I was just looking for you.
ch0113_40_mikan/1701_0702_01_10: Please use this on your adventures, if you can!
ch0113_40_mikan/2501_0701_01_10:
Umm... [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
I have a question for you.
ch0113_40_mikan/2501_0701_02_10:
Did you know that Celesteela weighs a whopping
2,204.4 pounds?
ch0113_40_mikan/2501_0701_03_10:
Isn’t it amazing that Celesteela can fly even
though it’s so heavy?!
ch0113_40_mikan/2501_0702_01_10:
I have this dream that I haven’t shared with
anyone yet...
ch0113_40_mikan/2501_0702_02_10:
Someday, I want to go on an adventure with
Celesteela, flying around to all the different
regions.
ch0113_40_mikan/2501_0702_03_10:
I know it would be a really, really amazing
adventure!
ch0113_40_mikan/2511_0701_01_10: Celesteela and Steelix spend lots of time together.
ch0113_40_mikan/2511_0701_02_10:
Sometimes they look like they’re discussing
something. Other times, it looks like they’re
showing off their polished bodies...
ch0113_40_mikan/2511_0701_03_10: I’m really curious about what they’re doing together.
ch0113_40_mikan/2511_0702_01_10:
I often see Celesteela and Steelix together right
after I’ve polished their bodies...
ch0113_40_mikan/2511_0702_02_10:
Maybe they really are showing off their shine
to each other.
ch0113_40_mikan/2511_0702_03_10:
If that’s so, I’d better start polishing them even
more often than I do now!
ch0113_40_mikan/3001_0701_01_10:
Sometimes when I accidentally brush up against
my Pokémon in the morning, their steel is so cold
that it wakes me right up!
ch0113_40_mikan/3003_0701_01_10:
I always keep a close eye on my Pokémon’s
health and well-being. I’d be so upset if one
got hurt or sick.
ch0113_40_mikan/3005_0701_01_10:
I think it’s really important for Trainers and
Pokémon to join together...with one heart and
one mind.
